description: This file defines API route handlers for a travel planning backend, handling CRUD operations for trips, destinations, itinerary items, accommodations, transport, and notes, along with a mock search endpoint.

methods.name: list_trips( db: Session = Depends(get_db), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list trips with pagination.

methods.name: create_trip(payload: TripCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new trip.

methods.name: get_trip(trip_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a trip by ID.

methods.name: update_trip(trip_id: int, payload: TripUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a trip by ID.

methods.name: delete_trip(trip_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete a trip by ID.

methods.name: list_destinations( db: Session = Depends(get_db), trip_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by trip id"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list destinations with optional filtering.

methods.name: create_destination(payload: DestinationCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new destination for a trip.

methods.name: get_destination(destination_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a destination by ID.

methods.name: update_destination(destination_id: int, payload: DestinationUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a destination by ID.

methods.name: delete_destination(destination_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete a destination by ID.

methods.name: list_itinerary( db: Session = Depends(get_db), trip_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by trip id"), destination_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by destination id"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list itinerary items with filtering.

methods.name: create_itinerary(payload: ItineraryItemCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new itinerary item.

methods.name: get_itinerary(item_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve an itinerary item by ID.

methods.name: update_itinerary(item_id: int, payload: ItineraryItemUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update an itinerary item by ID.

methods.name: delete_itinerary(item_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete an itinerary item by ID.

methods.name: list_accommodations( db: Session = Depends(get_db), trip_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by trip id"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list accommodations.

methods.name: create_accommodation(payload: AccommodationCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new accommodation.

methods.name: get_accommodation(acc_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve an accommodation by ID.

methods.name: update_accommodation(acc_id: int, payload: AccommodationUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update an accommodation.

methods.name: delete_accommodation(acc_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete an accommodation by ID.

methods.name: list_transport( db: Session = Depends(get_db), trip_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by trip id"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list transport entries.

methods.name: create_transport(payload: TransportCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new transport entry.

methods.name: get_transport(transport_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a transport entry by ID.

methods.name: update_transport(transport_id: int, payload: TransportUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a transport entry.

methods.name: delete_transport(transport_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete a transport entry.

methods.name: list_notes( db: Session = Depends(get_db), trip_id: Optional[int] = Query(None, description="Filter by trip id"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), limit: int = Query(25, ge=1, le=100, description="Limit for pagination"), )
methods.description: Handles GET request to list notes.

methods.name: create_note(payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new note.

methods.name: get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve a note by ID.

methods.name: update_note(note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update a note.

methods.name: delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to delete a note by ID.

methods.name: search_destinations(q: str = Query(..., min_length=1, description="Search query"), country: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Country filter"))
methods.description: Mock endpoint to search destinations based on a query string and optional country.
